channel.title: Vps
channel.description: This is too warn people looking for a vps http://www.softsyshosting.com/ is the worst vps company. Status will stay pending for 3-8 hrs. The support is shit. There are no admins so they need your client password all the time like wtf. They charge $50 an hour for tech help lol! complete rip off. Just warning you guys looking for a vps(:

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Don’t purchase a VPS if you don’t know what you’re doing. Imo, they should charge $100 so people aren’t tempted to do a trial and error on their configurations.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

There’s nothing wrong with softsyshosting. Don’t order a self-managed plan if you’re a retard.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

If you’re looking for a decent vps host with good support, then checkout the managed plans at racksteady.co.uk, response time may take a few hours but the fully managed plans come with full support and they’ll most likely be able to help you with any problems you encounter. They’re a little pricy but you pay that for the support, the unmanaged plans are much cheaper but technically there’s no support, but if you send a support ticket in anyway they may be able to help.

Read full topic
